column4: CORRECTED-UPDATE 3-U.S. activist Elliott urges overhaul at Samsung Electronics
column5: Oct 5 U.S. hedge fund Elliott Management is urging changes at Samsung Electronics Co Ltd  calling on the South Korean tech giant to streamline its structure and to pay out a special dividend.
